useState.description: A Hook that lets you add React state to function components.

useEffect.description: A Hook that lets you perform side effects in function components.

useContext.description: A Hook that lets you subscribe to React context without introducing nesting.

useReducer.description: A Hook that lets you manage complex state logic in function components.

useRef.description: A Hook that lets you reference a value that's not needed for rendering or access DOM elements directly.

useMemo.description: A Hook that lets you cache the result of a calculation between re-renders.
useMemo.syntax: const memoizedValue = useMemo(() => computeExpensiveValue(a, b), [a, b]);

useCallback.description: A Hook that lets you cache a function definition between re-renders.
useCallback.syntax: const memoizedCallback = useCallback(() => { doSomething(a, b); }, [a, b]);
